comment: 4 tests(1 gets dropped) hw every week (easy just look up the questions. Recitation and class attendance is not mandatory but the examples from both are basically the test. The test is broken into 2parts. 1) multiple choice 2) math problems. You can choose the ones you know how to do. Shes super nice and wants you to learn. Love her!

4 exams, lowest dropped. Homework due every week but only 10 questions. Cumulative final exam. Go to recitation (breakout session) because the problems in recitation are very similar to the test sometimes identical. Easy A. Don't bother buying the book.
rating_tags: Respected--Lots of homework--Graded by few things
